1.content:
Axel laid there on a metal bed, frost coating his body as a beam of red laser shone over him
"How is he doing" A figure wearing a white coat said as the computer next to him analyzed the body
"Subject is Human Male, age 21 in good condition both mentally and physically" The computer said
"That is fortunate" Preparing the subject for reanimation" The Doctor said escorting the body in a glass box where he laid
"Preparing reanimation" The Computer stated as a colored liquid filled the box forming around the body as the water turned into a gel-like substance turning from clear to red covering the body as it sprung to life clenching his throat breathing deep as it stood up, gel falling off in clots as the box was flushed. the human stood their rubbing his eyes
"What Happened?" Axel asked curious as to why he was standing naked in a glass container as the door opened
"You've been asleep for quite some time, over a thousand earth years" The coated figure said as Axel's eyes came into focus seeing the figure representing a reptile, with green scaly flesh as his tongue licked his own eyeballs as Axel looked in disgust
"Who the hell are you!" Axel asked retreating in the box
"I'm The Doctor, I Reanimated you, you've been out for awhile" The Doctor said continuing his eyeball Licking as Axel Looked away
"Why are you doing that" Axel asked uncomfortable as The Doctor stopped
"Sorry, I forget people from your era have never seen a Xian before" The Doctor stated
"Xian?' Axel said confused as The doctor glanced
"Yes My Species, I'm an alien, and to answer your question, I Don't have eyelids, so licking is how I Keep my eyes moist" The Doctor said
"So Doctor, where am I?" Alex said On edge of seeing an alien
"Your on the GF Scorpio the Galatix Force Ship." The Doctor replied licking his eyeballs
"Galatix Force, What is that?" Axel asked as The dotor handing him a towel to dry off
"The Galatix Force was established to travel space for all that is right" The doctor said as Axel was drying off
"So are you going to drop me off at Earth or something" Axel said confused
"Earth 2 is 7 killafs away, where not turning for one person" The doctor said
"Earth 2?" Axel said confused
"Yeah after earth became unsuitable in 2600 Earth 2 was formed as a place for Humans to colonize
"Wait how did the earth become unsuitable, Nuclear war?" Axel asked
"Global Warning, Earth Prime froze over and entered an ice age, after humans left the planet it was taken by the Cyrogal" The Doctor said
"Damn" Axel said as The Doctor handed him a black jumpsuit
"Welcome to Galatix Force, you should probably introduce yourself to the other recruits" The Doctor said opening a steel door into a hallway seeing another alien
"So you're the new G.F.R." the Alien said
"G.F.R. what does that mean?" Alex asked
"Galatix Force Ranger, you jumpsuit makes you a recruit" The Alien said
"Name's Axel Thorn and you are?" Axel asked as the alien replied
"My Name is
1.title: Reanimation

14.content:
The Green girl looked up
"My Name is Vera Li" she said with a bit of disdain
"Well, you look different?" Axel said a bit confused looking it the girl, she wore a suit similar to his, her light green skin complemented by her braided hair,her tail hanging behind her. Vera pouted as Axel noticed the huge sword on her back
"You act like you've never seen a Litian before" Vera crossed her arm as Axel shrugged
"I Haven't, I'm from Earth Prime, I've never seen an alien before today" Axel explained
"Just know I'm superior to you and we'll get along fine in my squad" Vera explained
"Your squad?" Axel asked as Vera glared at him
"Yes earthling, My squad; I'll escort you to the barracks" Vera said walking away as she turned around
"Hurry up Rookie" Vera stated as Axel shrugged following her
"So Vera, You mind telling me about yourself" Axel asked as she looked at him
"What do you want to know?" Vera asked bitter to Axel as he turned away
"Just basic stuff, I Just got out of Cyrosleep" Axel replied
"That's a personal problem" Vera said escorting Axel to door with an 1 carved on it as Vera opened it revealing what resembled a apartment
"Vera" A rock creature said sitting in a sofa reading a digital tablet
"Grif, this is Alex, the rookie, Alex this is Grif Stonebiter, my squad-mate" Vera said as Grif reached in a bowl of gravel grabbing a handful putting it in his mouth chewing
"What is he?" Axel asked
"Grif is a Graniteion, their a species of miners, they eats rocks and often worked in construction" Vera explained
"And I see you met Vera" Grif said shoveling another handful of gravel in his mouth
"I'm going to the Mess Hall, you two get acquainted, Grif make sure the Human doesn't touch any of my things" Vera said walking off
"Yes Vera" Grif said as the girl left. Grif scooted over on the sofa
"Sit down Axel" Grif asked as Axel did so
"I'd like to apologize for Vera, she can a bit brash, but she's alright once you get to know her" Grif said
"I Guess being Leader is a hard job" Axel stated
"Vera is not really our leader, we have not been assigned a squad leader but Vera sort of promoted herself unofficial leader
"So tell me about Vera" Axel requested
"Well she's a Litian, they're a fierce group of warriors from a planet where female are the dominant gender, she's also one of the top fighters here" Grif said shoveling a handful a gravel as he handed to bowl to Axel as he held his hand up
"No thanks" He replied as Grif stood up, I'll show you your bed" Grif said escorting Axel to a hallway with three doors, two with plaques with Vera and Grif's name the third blank.
"We did research it should simulate the environment of an earth room" Grif said as Axel looked, It looked like a bedroom, decorated in a mix of 60's, 70's and 80's culture
"It's pretty cool" Axel responded
"Welcome to the team, I'm gonna get some sparing in the training room, catch you later" Grif said leaving
14.title: Squadmates

143.content:
Vera walked into the mess hall trudging her feet at the thought of a another squad-mate, she worked best on her own as she grabbed a metallic dish walking to the food dispensary holding up a card pushing a few buttons on a keypad pulling a lever as a thick white gel filled the bowl. Vera walked to a table sitting down, picking up what resembled a spork running it thru the food as she began her meal. Vera reached in her chest pocket pulling out her music player as she held two small plastic spheres in her hand placing them in her ears listening to music as she feasted.
A figure walked up to her snapping fingers
"Vera" the figure called out as the girl was lost into her device as the figure winked putting his hand on her shoulder as she quickly flipped him onto the table drawing her blade resembling a curved machete
"Nice to see you two Vera" the figure joked
'Flynt, what who do want!" Vera demanded looking at the gunman who wore a red jumpsuit and his attire resembles that of a cowboy with a cloak and hat
"I just heard you rookies got a new meat" Flynt teased
"What did I say about calling me Rookie" Vera replied withdrawing her blade over shoulder
"It's true, your not an official team, hence why your suits are black, and done attack a ranger or i will report you" Flynt said dusting himself of walking away as Vera shook her fist.
"You Reds can air duct out of here" Vera muttered continuing her meal
"Who was that" Axel said walking into the room
"That was Flynt Loch, the Arcis and leader of the Red squad, there the biggest Jerks on the ship" Vera explained
"Why did he call you rookie?" Axel asked as Vera slammed her tray down
"Because we're not an official team, okay; are you happy" Vera yelled
"Vera, i just got here" Axel replied in defense
"Before you're a ranger you're a recruit, as marked by the black jumpsuits you me and Grif wear, one you get promoted to rangers you get suits in a new color and are allowed to customize them" Vera explained as Axel backed up
"Okay, i see you want to be alone so I'll just head back to the barracks" Axel said leaving as Vera watched Flynt sitting with his team, Brutis and Xero, they were the top team in the GFR and the Coolest and the most popular, Vera despised the Red squad they treated everyone else like they were below them. Vera just sat them eating her meal keeping her eyes on the reds wishing the worst for them. after finishing her meal he carried her dish to the sanitizing unit and left the Mess Hall
"What makes them so special" Vera asked as to why the recruits idolized the Red Squad, It filled her with ambition to better herself to be the best, but she was in a team of worthless idiot, a Stone miner and a human, she believed Males were inferior but still this is the worst crops, Flynt and an Apex Predator and a cybernetic ninja. There was no way she beat them now.
"Enough Vera, you can't let them know they get to you" Vera pump talked herself. contemplating what to do next she
143.title: Colors

1432.content:
Vera pulled out the earbuds putting them in her chest pocket as she walked down the hallway coming to the training room. Vera pushed a button on the door frame as the metal door split in two opening for Vera to enter. She glared over to Grif who was lifting wights on bench press as he placed the dumbbell on the rack, held up by a machine standing up wiping his forehead with a rag
"Hey Vera" Grif said about to take the wights off the bar
"Leave the wight on" Vera ordered as Grif retracted his finger from the weight adjustment button as Vera got on the bench-press putting her arms on the pole lifting
"Vera, Could you please try being nice to the new guy?" Grif asked holding a liquid canister unscrewing the top taking sip
"What do you mean?" Vera asked in a sour tone pumping the bar
"Just Show him some respect" Grif requested as Vera glared him
"Respect, I Don't respect Rookies, more weight" Vera demanded
as Grif adjusted the wight turning up the resistance
"Vera, we're all rookies, Axel, Me and You" Grif reminded
"But I'm The leader of this group, and I'm not just gonna give me respect to me subordinates" Vera replied sweating from the exercise
"Vera, a leader looks out for their followers" Grif replied walking off
"Remember that" Grif replied leaving the training room as Vera continued lifting for a good while. when she was done Vera went to the jogging simulator next, which functioned like a treadmill as she proceed running in place after turning her music back on. Vera proceeded her jogging to blow off her steam. Vera continued this until she was tired and sore. after getting off the simulator she walked over to a beverage dispenser placing her card in the machine pushing a button as the front opened showing a glass canister with metal ends as Vera unscrewed the top taking a sip wiping her forehead. after the exercise she decided to go the bathing unit before going to bed. Vera walked back to recruit barracks for her unidentified team where Axel and Grif were playing a video game.
"Hey Vera" Axel called out playing with Grif as Vera walked into her bedroom ignoring them as the two continued playing. Vera walked to the two taking a sip from her canister
"What a waste of time, a brainless beat em up simulator with no skill needs" Vera replied screwing the canister setting it on a table
"Grif, new kid don't touch my beverage" Vera said entering her room
"Agian I apoligize for Vera's behavior but don't worry, she'll warm up in time" Grif said
Vera left her room holding a spare jumpsuit. I'm going to clean off, you two dunderheads continue playing that stupid game" Vera said leaving the room as Grif paused the game
"I'm gonna call it a night, see you later" Grif said heading to his room as Axel continued playing the game.
1432.title: First Night...In Space

14322.content:
Vera Made way to the bathing unit as she took a deep sigh . she ran her forearm against her forehead. she pulled out her card to hold up to the door as it opened and she recoiled seeing Xero exiting
"Xero" Vera said casually, seeing the ninja fully armored
"Vera" The Ninja replied through a heavily processed voice distort sounding mechanical as Vera glared
"You rarely come to the bathing room so What do you want?" Vera asked
"Nothing, I just finished, all yours" the Ranger gestured as Vera grunted
"I Saw you got a new recruit" Xero said as Vera grumbled looking up at Xero
"That's none of your business " Vera snarled
"Why are you so keen on antagonizing me?" Xero asked curious as Very stared
"I despise your team you're all a bunch of self-entitled jerk who think your superior" Vera replied
"You Don't know anything about me, I'm leaving" Xero stated walking away
"Oh my Stars, He's such a dick" Vera stated
"What was that" Xero responded turning around
"Yeah just keep walking" Vera replied as Xero did so as Vera proceeded into the bathing room.
Xero walked down the halls before colliding into Axel as they both fell hitting the floor
"Ow, sorry my bad" Axel said getting up extending his hand to Xero who took it graciously
"Thank you" Xero said confused running scan on the human
"It's no problem, I'm new here so I wanna be on everyone's good side" Axel stated
"Well, you're certainly on mine" Xero replied walking away
"What a nice guy" Axel thought walking down the hall
14322.title: Xero

info.brief_description: The tales of a human who joins a group of alien space fighters who travel the galaxy
info.description:
(This will be updated as we move on)

It is the year 3500, The Galatix Force are a group of youths who travel around space getting involved in crazy adventures as a force of good. Recently they have found one of the few remaining humans of Earth Prime encased in Cyrosleep and this is his story

Galatix Force is a tribute to the cartoons of the 60s

Characters

GFR staff

The Doctor- Species: Xian- age 46- gender: male- resembles a lizard- expert doctor

GFR

Red Squad

Flynt Loch- species: Arcis- age 20- gender: male- identical to an earth elf- expert gunsman/ bounty hunter
Brutis- Species: Brox- age 25- gender: male- Resembles a jungle cat- efficient hunter/ tracker
Xero- species: unknown- age unknown- gender: unknown- covered in a mechanical exosuit with arm mounted blades - expert fighter

Recruits
Axel Thorn- Species: Human- age 21- gender: male- new recruit- trained with a gun so a natural shot
Grif Stonebiter- species: Graniteion- age 19- gender: male- has flesh resembling granite- able to eat rock
Vera Li- species: Litian- age 18- gender: female- green smooth skin with a reptile-like tail- professional warrior
